titles.title: Small Business Defense Conversion Guaranteed Loan Act of 1994
To amend the Small Business Act to authorize appropriations for deferred participation loans to small business concerns detrimentally affected by defense reductions, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary: 4/12/1994--Introduced. Small Business Defense Conversion Guaranteed Loan Act of 1994 - Amends the Small Business Act to: (1) authorize the Administrator of the Small Business Administration (SBA) to make loans on a guaranteed basis (currently, authorized but not guaranteed) to small businesses adversely affected by the closure of military bases or reductions or terminations of defense contracts; (2) allow such loans to small businesses that experience a substantial reduction in revenues due to such factors; and (3) authorize the SBA to make no more than $2 billion in deferred participation loans to such small businesses for each of FY 1995 and 1996.
